The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 August is 287,502 (510.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 25 August, there were 6,652 new confirmed cases (11.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 August, there were 6,377 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 4% (275 extra cases).
